meta.description: Maximize the data flow from the data center (Point 0) to the user hub (Point 5) in a telecommunications network with given capacities.

sets.name: POINTS
sets.description: Key points in the telecommunications network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of data lines between points in GB/s.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of data from one point to another in GB/s.

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from the data center (Point 0) to the user hub (Point 5) in GB/s.

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total data flow from Point 0 to Point 5.

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source (Point 0).

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink (Point 5).

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate node Point 1.

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate node Point 2.

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_3
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate node Point 3.

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_4
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate node Point 4.

constraints.name: capacity_0_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 0 to Point 1.

constraints.name: capacity_0_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 0 to Point 2.

constraints.name: capacity_0_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 0 to Point 3.

constraints.name: capacity_0_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 0 to Point 4.

constraints.name: capacity_0_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 0 to Point 5.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 1 to Point 0.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 1 to Point 2.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 1 to Point 3.

constraints.name: capacity_1_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 1 to Point 5.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 2 to Point 0.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 2 to Point 1.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 2 to Point 3.

constraints.name: capacity_2_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 2 to Point 4.

constraints.name: capacity_2_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 2 to Point 5.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 3 to Point 0.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 3 to Point 1.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 3 to Point 2.

constraints.name: capacity_3_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Point 3 to Point 5.
